content.rendered:
A better approach to dental care

BOOK ONLINE
CALL TO BOOK

Full-range dental services

From routine cleaning and check-ups to advanced dental procedures, we've got you covered.

Transparency & open communication

We provide clear and detailed information regarding treatment options, costs and expected outcomes.

Compassionate clinical team

Our doctors put your comfort and confidence as top priority to provide personalized treatment plans.

A soothing environment
and dentists who love to listen

A soothing environment and our dentists love to listen

Around 75% of people experience some level of anxiety during dental visits. Avoiding routine dental check-ups can lead to undetected dental issues and many oral diseases. 

At reform, we addresses this problem by fostering a mindful and patient-centric approach. We are thoughtfully designed and equipped with the latest technology. Our doctors are friendly and genuinely care about listening to your needs and concerns.

Call to book an appointment

Complete range of dental care

Procedures

Root canal treatment, implants, veneers, fillings & other dental procedures. Our team of dentists are experienced and specializes in all kinds of dental procedures.

Orthodontics

Braces and invisalign® aligners.
Orthodontic treatments can not only enhance the appearance of your teeth, but also improve their functionality.

Preventive Care

Teeth cleaning, polishing, X-rays, and routine dental check-ups. Keeping up with preventive dental care can save yourself from painful and costly dental procedures in the future.

Emergency

Urgent appointments for pain, wisdom tooth extraction, cracked teeth, and more.​

Conveniently located in
HSR Layout, Bengaluru

Our dental clinic is located near Bangalore One HSR Park, with easy parking and a noise free environment.

Get directions

Google reviews

Let's hear from our patients

Vishnu Prasad

Read More
One of the best dental clinic in HSR Layout. I recently had the pleasure of visiting an incredibly aesthetic and pleasant dental clinic for my wisdom tooth extraction surgery. Doctor took the time to explain the procedure, addressing all my concerns and ensuring I felt comfortable throughout. The post-operative care instructions were clear and easy to follow.
Upasana Baliyarsingh

Read More
Visited Reform for a filling replacement and for dental cleaning recently. I have had a fantastic experience with them so far. Dr. Mehnaz explains the procedure to you and will answer any questions and clear any doubts you may have. They will listen to you and are great with pain management as well. They also maintain a very aesthetic and clean clinic which is extremely calming and helpful if you’re nervous getting your teeth worked on. I highly recommend Reform to anyone who’s looking to get dental work done.
Chandan Aradhya

Read More
Very polite and professional staff. Neat and clean with good interior. Did my root canal treatment and doctor gave proper explanation of what they were doing with my teeth. They took special care to answer all my doubts! I have been to other dental clinics in the past but this was a very satisfying experience!
Ramesh C

Read More
We have been visiting Dr Mehnaz for few months now for fillings as well as RCT. I should say she is a very kind, genuine and caring dentist who looks at the long term outcome of the patient than her own profits. She is always available for any queries. Overall very happy with the treatments.
Soniya Pawar

Read More
Wonderful team and service. I have a fear of doctors and dentist in particular,..due to some bad experiences i've had at other clinics in the past. The initial appointment made me comfortable. so decided to proceed with my root canal treatment and cap. Pricing matters were handled efficiently and there were no surprises in that regard. Keep up the good work. ‎
Chaitanya Darisa

Read More
My mother had missing front teeth and was not able to smile properly. We visited reform dental care and the doctor gave us the treatment option. Undergone multiple root canals and bridges. We are very satisfied with their level of care and attention to details throughout the treatment. The charges are affordable too. We have visited many dental clinics before..i think this is one of the best dentist in hsr layout. They treat like a family.

excerpt.rendered: Reform is a dental clinic in HSR Layout, Bangalore. We are designed to provide a stress-free dental visit. Fear of going to the dentist is common among many people. We address this by fostering a mindful and patient-centric approach.
